Detailed Description

AuxProvider is the provider to retrieve different kind of data from the mobile station. An instance of this class is part of the Apoxi Data Control. A pointer to this provider can be retrieved from the main provider via the id:

c_aux_provider_id

Following column ids are defined: c_imsi_id :WStringType: IMSI as a string. c_imei_id :WStringType: IMEI as a string. c_mcc_id :NumberType: mobile country code contained in the imsi. c_mnc_id :NumberType: mobile network code contained in the imsi. c_mnc_threedigits_id :NumberType: cast to BOOLEAN, tells if MNC has three digits. c_sim_ind_id :NumberType: sim indication state, cast to SimIndicator. c_icc_id :WStringType: ICCID as a string. c_sim_ind_id :NumberType: c_sim_type_id :NumberType: type of the sim, cast to SimType. c_sim_phase_id :NumberType: value of the sim phase as defined in GSM 11.11 c_lang_pref_id :NumberType: prefered language, mandatory language in as defined GSM 11.11 V8.2.0 10.3.1 c_fdn_state_id :NumberType: cast to SimInitResult (FDN State) c_spn_id :WStringType: service provider name as defined in GSM 11.11 V8.2.0 10.3.11 c_spn_display_condition_id :NumberType: display condition of the spn as defined in GSM 11.11 V8.2.0 10.3.11, cast to BOOLEAN c_acm_id :NumberType: acm value c_acm2_id :NumberType: acm value for line2 c_acmmax_id :NumberType: acm maximum value as defined in GSM 11.11 V8.2.0 10.3.6 c_currency_code_id :WStringType: currency code as a wstring, defined in GSM 11.11 V8.2.0 10.3.12 c_currency_exp_id :NumberType: currency exponent, defined in GSM 11.11 V8.2.0 10.3.12 c_currency_eppu_id :NumberType: elementary price per unit, defined in GSM 11.11 V8.2.0 10.3.12 c_network_lockstate_id :NumberType: network lockstate, cast to LockStatus. c_sp_lockstate_id :NumberType: service provider lockstate, cast to LockStatus. c_sim_lockstate_id :NumberType: sim lockstate, cast to LockStatus. c_corporate_lockstate_id :NumberType: network lockstate, cast to LockStatus. c_sim_errorcode_id :NumberType: c_loci_update_status_id :NumberType: cast to LocationUpdateStatus enum. c_loci_mcc_id :NumberType: MCC of the LOCI file. c_loci_mnc_id :NumberType: MNC of the LOCI file. c_loci_mnc_threedigits_id :NumberType: cast to BOOLEAN, tells if LOCI-MNC has three digits. c_loci_lac_id :NumberType: LAI of the LOCI file. c_acm_chv_id :NumberType: cast to ChvNo c_acmmax_chv_id :NumberType: cast to ChvNo c_puct_chv_id :NumberType: cast to ChvNo c_ofm_to_be_activated_id :NumberType: cast to BOOLEAN, TRUE if b1=1 of EF-AD Byte 3, regarding GSM 11.11,10.3.18

This provider only consists of one fixed row.

NOTE: Please do not instantiate this class.
